defaults.noValue: If no data, check Time Filter

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  o.id AS order_id,
  o.total_amount AS order_total,
  o.name AS customer_name,
  or_it.id AS order_item_id,
  or_it.product_name AS order_product_name,
  p.sku as product_sku

FROM orders o
JOIN order_items or_it ON or_it.order_id = o.id
LEFT JOIN products p ON p.id = or_it.id
#LEFT JOIN equipments e ON e.id = ev.equipment_id
#ORDER BY o.id, or_it.id, or_it.product_name;  #You don’t need GROUP BY unless you're doing aggregation

SELECT
    o.first_name AS owner_name,
    COUNT(DISTINCT v.id) AS venue_count,
    COUNT(DISTINCT e.id) AS equip_count,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT v.venue_name ORDER BY v.venue_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS venue_names, # all owner venues in one column

    #GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(e.trademark_name, ' ', e.model_name) ORDER BY e.trademark_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS equipment_names, #to list owner 'trademark_name + model name' in one column

    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT e.trademark_name ORDER BY e.trademark_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS equipment_names,  # to list all owner 'trademark_name' in one column
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT e.model_name ORDER BY e.model_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS eq_model_names    # to list all owner  'model_name'in one column
FROM owners o
LEFT JOIN venues v ON v.owner_id = o.id
LEFT JOIN equipment_venue ev ON ev.venue_id = v.id
LEFT JOIN equipments e ON e.id = ev.equipment_id
GROUP BY o.id, o.first_name
ORDER BY o.first_name;

SELECT
  o.id AS order_id,
  o.name AS customer_name,
  o.total_amount AS order_total,
  GROUP_CONCAT(or_it.product_name ORDER BY or_it.id SEPARATOR ', ') AS order_items
FROM orders o
JOIN order_items or_it ON or_it.order_id = o.id
GROUP BY o.id, o.name, o.total_amount
ORDER BY o.id;

SELECT
  o.id AS owner_id,
  o.first_name AS owner_name,
  v.id AS venue_id,
  v.venue_name AS venue_name,
  e.id AS equipment_id,
  e.trademark_name,
  e.model_name
FROM owners o
JOIN venues v ON v.owner_id = o.id
LEFT JOIN equipment_venue ev ON ev.venue_id = v.id
LEFT JOIN equipments e ON e.id = ev.equipment_id
ORDER BY o.id, v.id, e.trademark_name;

defaults.noValue: If no data, check Time Filter

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE(created_at) AS time,
  COUNT(*) AS owner_count
FROM
  owners
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
GROUP BY
  DATE(created_at)
ORDER BY
  time;

SELECT 
    owner.first_name,
    venue.venue_name,
    equipment.trademark_name,
    COUNT(venue.id) AS venue_count,
    COUNT(equipment.id) AS equipment_count,
    #COUNT(DISTINCT venue.owner_id) as venues_count,
    owner.created_at
FROM 
    owners as owner

INNER JOIN 
    venues as venue ON  owner.id = venue.owner_id #AND venue.id = eq_v.venue_id  #pivot table
    
INNER JOIN 
   equipment_venue as eq_v ON venue.id = eq_v.venue_id   #pivot table 


INNER JOIN 
    equipments as equipment ON equipment.id = eq_v.equipment_id  #pivot table


GROUP BY 
    owner.first_name,
    venue.venue_name,
    equipment.trademark_name,
    owner.created_at

targets.rawSql:
#top two viewed
 SELECT 
 product_id, 
 COUNT(product_id) AS total_views 
 FROM analytics_dataset.product_views 
 GROUP BY product_id 
 ORDER BY total_views DESC 
 LIMIT 2
